item.title: Coding issue : Error Message
item.dc:creator: @briice14 briice14
item.description:
@briice14 wrote:

Hello Moparscape user

2 hours ago i added dragon claws on my server, very good working .

But i tryed to add A spirit Shield, just one to try … So on my class8.java i add the code :

{
class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5];

class8.aByteArray178 = “It’s a arcane spirit sheild.”.getBytes();
}

I added the model on my model folder .

But my i compile my client , i see that :

Class8.java:138: code too large

0; j++) if(aClass8Array172[j].anInt157 == i) return aC
lass8Array172[j]; anInt180 = (anInt180 + 1) % 10; Class8 class8 =

95[i]; class8.anInt157 = i; class8.method197(); class8.meth

Can someone help me ?
